summary: Implements a ConvNeXt building block that processes tensors in (N, C, H, W) format using a depthwise convolution, layer normalization, two pointwise (1x1) convolutions with GELU activation, and optional stochastic depth for regularization.
business_intent: Supply a modular component for assembling ConvNeXt neural networks, facilitating efficient spatial feature extraction and regularization in computer vision models such as image classification.
